CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'App Received'),'App Received', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'App Processed'),'App Processed', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'Conditional Assessed'),'Conditional Assessed',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Conditionally Approved'), 'Conditionally Approved',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'Conditional Accepted'),'Conditional Accepted',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Assessment in Progress'), 'Assessment in Progress', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Recommended'), 'Recommended', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'LOO Issued'), 'LOO Issued', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Formally Approved'), 'Formally Approved', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'LOO Accepted'), 'LOO Accepted', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Loan Settled'), 'Loan Settled',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'APPROVED'), 'Approved', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Declined'), 'Declined', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Cancelled'), 'Cancelled',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Solicitor Instructed'),'Solicitor Instructed','Approved - Converted to Contract')))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Application Status
